buginformation.description: update benchmark baseline on support branch on new minor release change end-of-support message to version-based not time-based fix typo in Dockerfile make it clear that Dockerfile on develop is a template, not actually buildable except on a support branch after it has had at least one release

A test should be created where clients continually authenticate to a cluster while members are being killed and restarted. Any problem behavior identified should be turned into tickets for addressing the issues.
